body: Wonder when the story will go back into focus on Cecilia becoming the succubus queen

I don't understand how you can say Ulfiora was wasted. I honestly loved how Madame Livon, that huge-titted dominating goddess, melted Fio'f brain with a constant stream of sex, sexual stimulants, and her own enhanced aphrodisiac pit stink all because Fio was thinking with her new dick. Livon had Fio in the palm of her hand, molding her mind and preparing her to actually have a 12-hour fuckfest with a female pig for her entertainment. Freyja though, that brainwashed whore wife with those massive tit melons, has a top tier arc with her implied mind control enslaving her to her future husband though. Sooo hot knowing she's now carrying his baby.
Everything except their noses is excellent.
Way to waste 2nd best girl Ulfiora, Freyja remains queen
This is prime "came for the art, stayed for the story" material
So much shit going in this series, though I admit that even after checking the tags, I still dived in and read it while skipping the parts that I didn't like.
Read the tags first, it's always about the goddamn tags!
